text: @afneil #coronavirus #COVID19 #lockdown #SocialDistancing #ChineseVirus _ I feel that China has lied from the beginning. I'm sure their real death rate is much high. After causing the coronavirus pandemic, I'm waiting for the Chinese to go on a buying spree of weakened companies.
